AQI India

Freshmen Year Summer

Freshmen Year Internship. Worked as an Embedded and Full Stack Mean Developer for AQI India. Starting out developing firmware for the companies's sensors in C/C++ under the guidance of an Embedded Systems Engineer. Wrote Algorithms to send the data from the sensors to the company's server.

Managed the Date using MongoDB/SQL and PHP and made algorithms for data handling with arrays, objects, binary search trees. Used frameworks such as .NET, AWS and many more. Helped and marketed the sensors through presentations, videos.

Worked on the front-end design with a wed-designer and wrote the HTML/CSS/Bootstrap mark-up for website with the given design from the UI/UX wed-designer. Managed back-end data from the sensors and displayed it using various javascript frameworks such as Node.js, React.js, jQuerry.
